title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as 'foo.txt')
3. From the main menu, select 'File' -> 'Export' and select 'Zip File' to export
4. 

OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name but under different directories to a zip file, an error message box pops up. The detail of the error message points to the file with the same name in project2 as the problem.

EB: When exporting multiple files with the same name but under different directories to a zip file, the export should complete successfully without encountering any errors or conflicts.

SR: To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as 'foo.txt')
3. From the main menu, select 'File' -> 'Export' and select 'Zip File' to export
4.
